basics.name: Mario Bastardo Gago
basics.label: Backend Java Developer | @Almis Informática Financiera
basics.summary: I am a Java backend developer, based in Valladolid. I work easily with dependency management systems as Maven and frameworks as Springboot. I do enjoy DevOps. I can also develop with C++ and Python. I adapt extremely well to changes and new methodologies. I love to research in productivity, efficiency, organization and optimization methodologies (5S, Kaizen, Monozukuri, Kanban...). I would love to work automating processes. I also have a background in car factories and as a mechanic there, which happens to be my passion. I speak english fluently and I have no problem in communicating in french
